name: "Infinite" tables with component props
description:
Using component props, we can set up huge table components and toggle on the amount of rows/columns we need when using them.


This prevents us having to create lots of variants for "table with 1 column, table with 2 columns, table with 3 columns..." etc. Once we've set up the props once, we can use them in our files and toggle on what we need, when we need it.


It's also good practice here to set up an example table filled with content, in case people just need an example to use in their design files.
